'''v0.14.0 alpha build 5'''<ref>{{citation|url=http://pocketbeta.minecraft.net/2016/02/changelog-for-014-build-5.html|title=Minecraft: Beta Changelogs: Changelog for 0.14 build 5!|website=pocketbeta.minecraft.net}}</ref> is the fifth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.14.0 alpha|v0.14.0]].

== Changes ==
* [[Huge mushroom]]s shouldn't spawn in the water around roofed forests
* The inventory for [[dropper]]s, [[hopper]]s and [[dispenser]]s is more consistent with the other inventories
* Made loading a bit faster
* Snow broken with a shovel now drops [[snowball]]s

== Fixes ==
* Hoppers work again
* It's now possible to remove items from item frames in Survival without breaking them
* Entering boats doesn't place another boat anymore
* Destroying a boat doesn't destroy boats behind either
* Fixed many sprites being invisible in Front Third Person
* Fixed black artifacts in flat worlds
* Client's position is now saved correctly when they log out
* Rails cannot properly be laid in adjacent parallel lines in the east-west axis
* Fixed strange enchanting table behavior
* Leather Armor remains colored while flying between inventory slots
* Fixed Redstone burnout behaviors
* Fences don't have weird artifacts in the menus anymore
* Items don't duplicate when destroying their Item Frame anymore
* Minecarts now push each other consistently
* TNT doesn't disappear anymore on clients
* Fixed camera crash</onlyinclude>
